column2: §RED-GP: Enable Debug Mode§!
§YGreat Project Debug Mode§!\nEnabling debug mode will enable additional decisions, which allow full control of §YGreat Projects§! in your realm at zero cost.
§RED-GP: Disable Debug Mode§!
§YGreat Project Debug Mode§!\nDisable all debugging functionality
There is at most one player character in the game. (Debug mode cannot be activated in multiplayer.)
§RED-GP: Destroy Great Project§!
The Great Project "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!" (in §Y[This.Location.GetName]§!) will be §Rpermanently destroyed§!.
§RED-GP: Destroy Random Upgrade§!
A §Yrandom upgrade§! on the Great Project "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!" (in §Y[This.Location.GetName]§!)will be §Rdestroyed§!.
§RED-GP: Add Upgrade Slot§!
Add an §Yupgrade slot§! to the Great Project "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!" (in §Y[This.Location.GetName]§!).
§RED-GP: Remove Upgrade Slot§!
Remove an §Yupgrade slot§! from the Great Project "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!" (in §Y[This.Location.GetName]§!).
§MED-GP: Purchase Upgrade Slot§!
Pay a large amount of gold to add an §Yupgrade slot§! to the Great Project "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!" (in §Y[This.Location.GetName]§!).
An §Yupgrade slot§! will be §Gadded§! to "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!"
An §Yupgrade slot§! will be §Rremoved§! from "§Y[This.Location.Wonder.GetName]§!"
